channel.title: Free stuff?
channel.description:
I no longer play the game, but my friend does. I also check the news for updates every now and then too. The thing is though, every time I see my friend log on, there's always some kind of advertisement for free crap for members, like "Be a member for a month, and you get this necklace that gives 2x XP" or something like that. In fact, over the past month I've noticed they give out loads of free Squeal spins (whatever they're called) and free xp, and free random junk.
I've also actually stopped getting on their website because it seems like it take years to load due to the 565365536 million images on it.
Why is there so much 'product pushing' when just trying to play the damn game? They're just like allot of the generic MMOs now in the fact that they almost don't hide the fact that they're out for money. I know that was their original intentions, but at least they weren't to desperate and obvious back then.

item.title: Free stuff?
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“kickingjamie, post:3, topic:444062”]They are a profit organization…

If your business is losing lots of money do you let it die or do you do your best to get money out of your customers to keep the company alive. I know what I would do and Jagex do the same. I agree it is annoying for us players but if it keeps the game alive I say let them do it.

I really don’t think Jagex are out of money though.[/quote]
I never said they were. I’m just saying, they were pulling loads in revenue beforehand. I mean, I don’t mind benefits with becoming a member, just, I get sick of being told to do it every time I walk around. Surely the average child could remember to bug their parents enough to buy it after being reminds a few times.

That and I’m also tired of all the fancy gfx shit on the homepage, takes a year to load and it’s so unnecessary.

Read full topic

item.title: Free stuff?
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

kingman002:

i agree, i cant even play 5 minutes without 5 messages telling me to pay for member. squeel of fortune is gay. the only good reward is 10m cash, which is almost impossible. the odds are so low so they want to make you buy spins

I got the 10M cash on my pure without buying spins.
Wasn’t really excited though because I’d lost 20M that day so…

Read full topic

item.title: Free stuff?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

^ very true

I don’t blame Jagex really. It costs a lot of money to keep going in the current economy.

Read full topic

item.title: Free stuff?
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

Given that they currently have at least 2 other AAA games under development that generate 0 profit, it makes sense that they try to get as much as possible out of the only game that actually generates substantial revenue for them.

Read full topic

They are a profit organization…

If your business is losing lots of money do you let it die or do you do your best to get money out of your customers to keep the company alive. I know what I would do and Jagex do the same. I agree it is annoying for us players but if it keeps the game alive I say let them do it.

I really don’t think Jagex are out of money though.
